title: Effect of relative humidity on molecular composition of secondary organic aerosol from α-pinene ozonolysis

Secondary organic aerosols (SOA) originated from the oxidation of biogenic volatile organic compounds such as monoterpenes by atmospheric oxidants (e.g. OH, ozone, and NO3) constitute a widespread source of organic...
